name: Timeline Rupture
description: A magical anomaly creates a place where time flows differently, with areas of accelerated time, time loops, and temporal distortions. The temporal magic and unique time effects can be extremely valuable for research, while the unpredictable time distortions create constant danger of temporal displacement or aging.
atmosphere: Time itself seems to bend and twist around you like living thing. Air crackles with temporal magic and time manipulation scent. Skin tingles with presence of time distortions and temporal anomalies. Taste of temporal displacement and aging fills mouth. Weight of unpredictable time effects and temporal magic makes heart race with excitement and fear.
